instructions.name: create_treasury_proposal
docs: Create a treasury proposal with tokens deposited to escrow

instructions.name: execute_proposal
docs: Execute a passed treasury proposal (anyone can call)

instructions.name: reclaim_proposal_funds
docs: Reclaim funds from a failed treasury proposal (author only)

errors.name: ProposalNotActive
errors.msg: Proposal is not active.

errors.name: ProposalExpired
errors.msg: Proposal has expired.

errors.name: AlreadyVoted
errors.msg: You have already voted.

errors.name: CircuitBreakerTripped
errors.msg: System is OFFLINE (Circuit Breaker Tripped).

errors.name: InvalidVoteOption
errors.msg: Invalid vote option.

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized access.

errors.name: TokensLocked
errors.msg: Tokens are still locked.

errors.name: LockDurationDowngrade
errors.msg: Lock duration cannot be less than previous stake.

errors.name: NoTokensToUnstake
errors.msg: No tokens to unstake.

errors.name: NoVotingPower
errors.msg: No voting power available (Stake tokens first).

errors.name: InvalidTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid token account.

errors.name: InvalidLockDuration
errors.msg: Invalid lock duration.

errors.name: FaucetCooldown
errors.msg: You must wait 24 hours between faucet requests.

errors.name: InvalidDelegate
errors.msg: Delegate is not authorized or inactive.

errors.name: DirectVoteExists
errors.msg: User has already voted directly. Proxy cannot override.

errors.name: DelegationLoop
errors.msg: Delegation loop detected.

errors.name: DelegateCannotDelegate
errors.msg: Delegates cannot delegate (Chain delegation is not allowed).

errors.name: DelegatorCannotBeDelegate
errors.msg: Delegators cannot become delegates (Revoke delegation first).

errors.name: DelegatorsCannotVote
errors.msg: You have delegated your voting power. Revoke delegation to vote manually.

errors.name: ProxyVoteLocked
errors.msg: Vote was cast by proxy and is locked (cannot be withdrawn or changed).

errors.name: ProposalNotEnded
errors.msg: Proposal voting has not ended yet.

errors.name: TimelockNotPassed
errors.msg: Timelock period has not passed yet.

errors.name: ProposalNotPassed
errors.msg: Proposal was not approved (YES > NO required).

errors.name: ProposalPassed
errors.msg: Proposal passed, cannot reclaim funds.

errors.name: AlreadyExecuted
errors.msg: Proposal has already been executed.

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Transfer amount must be greater than 0.

errors.name: NotTreasuryProposal
errors.msg: This is not a treasury proposal.
